metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1726 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Bootstrap Tables XSS vulnerability with Table Export plug-in when exportOptions: htmlContent is true in GitHub repository wenzhixin/bootstrap-table prior to 1.20.2. Disclosing session cookies, disclosing secure session data, exfiltrating data to third-parties.

notes.Note: sbeattie> netdata and zoneminder include embedded copies of bootstrap-table

criterions.comment: netdata package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
